description.summary: This cluster comprises senior marketing and communications professionals who lead strategic initiatives, oversee large teams, and drive brand messaging across multiple channels. They hold executive or director-level positions and are responsible for shaping the overall marketing and communications strategy of their organizations.
description.typicalBackground: Individuals in this cluster typically have extensive experience in marketing and communications, holding senior roles such as Vice Presidents, Directors, or Managing Directors. They often have a background in developing and implementing comprehensive marketing strategies, managing large teams, and overseeing brand communications and media relations.

matchReasons: Holds a Vice President position overseeing strategy, media planning, and advertising
Expertise in strategic communications and corporate communications
Senior Brand Marketing Manager with leadership responsibilities
Skills in brand management and integrated marketing
Managing Director overseeing integrated marketing and digital strategy
Experience in leading comprehensive marketing initiatives

description.summary: Professionals in this cluster specialize in the planning, execution, and management of experiential marketing campaigns and events. They are responsible for creating immersive brand experiences, managing event logistics, and ensuring successful event outcomes that align with marketing objectives.
commonCharacteristics: Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously
description.typicalBackground: These individuals typically have a background in event production, experiential marketing, or related fields. They hold roles such as Producers, Event Managers, or Production Coordinators and have experience managing large-scale events, coordinating with multiple stakeholders, and executing marketing campaigns that involve direct consumer engagement.

matchReasons: Senior Producer responsible for event production and managing large budgets
Expertise in organizing high-profile events and brand activations
Experiential Producer overseeing brand experiences and event logistics
Strong background in managing multidisciplinary teams for experiential campaigns
Event Producer managing multiple high-profile projects
Skills in event management, production, and experiential marketing

description.summary: This cluster includes professionals who specialize in managing client relationships, overseeing account activities, and ensuring client satisfaction. They play a crucial role in maintaining and expanding business partnerships, handling client communications, and coordinating with internal teams to deliver on client needs.
description.typicalBackground: Individuals in this cluster usually have a background in account management, sales, or client relations within marketing and advertising agencies. They hold positions such as Account Directors, Account Supervisors, or Senior Account Managers and are adept at managing multiple client accounts, driving account growth, and ensuring the successful delivery of marketing campaigns.

matchReasons: Senior Account Supervisor managing client marketing initiatives
Expertise in cross-functional team leadership and account growth
Senior Vice President overseeing experiential and brand activation accounts
Strong background in managing key client relationships and strategic account management
Account Director responsible for client relationships and marketing campaigns
Skills in client communication and strategic account growth

description.summary: This cluster consists of creative leaders who oversee the artistic and production aspects of marketing campaigns. They are responsible for guiding creative teams, developing visual content, and ensuring that all creative output aligns with the brand's vision and marketing objectives.
commonCharacteristics: Excellent art direction and design skills
Ability to inspire and manage creative teams
description.typicalBackground: Typically, these professionals have extensive experience in creative roles within marketing agencies or in-house marketing departments. They hold titles such as Creative Director, Group Creative Director, or Senior Creative Manager and have a proven track record of leading creative projects, developing brand identities, and managing creative teams to produce compelling visual content.

matchReasons: Group Creative Director overseeing creative strategy and branding
Expertise in creative ideation and art direction
Senior Creative Director leading visual storytelling and branding efforts
Strong background in managing creative teams and developing brand identities
Creative Director responsible for brand management and visual content
Skills in creative strategy and team leadership

clusters.title: Project Managers in Marketing and Communications

description.summary: Professionals in this cluster focus on the planning, coordination, and execution of marketing and communications projects. They ensure that campaigns are delivered on time, within budget, and meet the desired objectives by managing resources, timelines, and cross-functional teams.
commonCharacteristics: Ability to manage timelines and budgets effectively
description.typicalBackground: These individuals usually have a background in project management within marketing or communications environments. They hold positions such as Project Manager, Marketing Project Manager, or Communications Project Coordinator and are adept at managing multiple projects simultaneously, coordinating with various teams, and ensuring successful project outcomes.

matchReasons: Director of Project Management overseeing marketing projects
Skills in strategic planning and project coordination
Senior Project Manager handling digital marketing projects
Experience in managing cross-functional teams and marketing campaigns
Project Manager specializing in marketing and communications
Strong background in budget management and campaign execution
